yaak.agent.communication.discovery
Class DiscoveryNotification

java.lang.Object
  yaak.agent.communication.discovery.DiscoveryNotification
public class DiscoveryNotification
extends java.lang.Object

DiscoveryNotification communicates (to a local observer/listener) the broadcast information for the base discovery-listener protocol.

Version:
$Id: DiscoveryNotification.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith
